item.description:
Join us for another summer-time pub crawl!  This time we will be crawling around Harvard Square.

Tentative schedule (subject to change):

2:00 p.m. - Shay's Pub and Wine Bar
3:00 p.m. - Charlie's Beer Garden (outside)
4:00 p.m. - Tommy Doyle's (I will update which floor as the date approaches)
5:00 p.m. - Grendel's Den
6:00 p.m. - Uno's
7:00 p.m. - Hong Kong
8:00 p.m. - Trata
9:00 p.m. - John Harvard's

As always, there is not cost to attend.  But please keep your own tab and remember to tip your bartenders!

Happy Crawling!
item.how_to_find_us: I will send an e-mail that Friday before that will include my cell phone.
item.name: Harvard Square Pub Crawl
